T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    holidays = [int(i) for i in input().split()][0:N]
    holidays.sort(reverse=False)
    sat_sun = [6, 7, 13, 14, 20, 21, 27, 28]
    initial_count = len(sat_sun)
    count_holidays = 0
    for e in holidays:
        if e in sat_sun:
            pass
        else:
            count_holidays += 1
    print(initial_count + count_holidays)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    a = int(input())
    m = list(map(int, input().split()))
    satsun = [6, 13, 20, 27, 7, 14, 21, 28]
    not_sunsat = list(filter(lambda x: x not in satsun, m))
    print(8 + len(not_sunsat))

def code():
    cases = int(input())
    for _ in range(cases):
        N = int(input())
        festival_days = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
        sats = [6, 13, 20, 27]
        suns = [7, 14, 21, 28]
        total_holidays = 0
        for day in festival_days:
            if day not in sats and day not in suns:
                total_holidays += 1
        total_holidays += len(sats) + len(suns)
        print(total_holidays)
code()

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    N1 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    n2 = [6, 7]
    n3 = 6
    n4 = 7
    n5 = 8
    while n3 < 28 and n4 < 28:
        n3 += 7
        n4 += 7
        n2.append(n3)
        n2.append(n4)
    for i in N1:
        if i not in n2:
            n5 += 1
    print(n5)

number_of_testcases = int(input())
for _ in range(number_of_testcases):
    festival_days = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    count = 8
    leave_days = [6, 7, 13, 14, 20, 21, 27, 28]
    for var in l:
        if var not in leave_days:
            leave_days.append(var)
            count = count + 1
    print(count)
